body:
+AMERICAS

+Greenland +Canada +Mexico +USA +Cascadia +Texas +Florida +California +Guatemala +Honduras +ElSalvador +Nicaragua +Panama +Costa_Rica +Colombia +Brazil +Uruguay +Paraguay +Bolivia +Argentina +Chile +Ecuador +Guyana +Suriname +Venezuela +Peru

+ASIA or +Asian

+Aceh +Afghanistan +armenia +Asir +Azerbaijan   +Bahrain +Balochistan +Bangladesh +Bangsamoro +Bhutan +Brunei +CAMBODIA +CHINA +Cyprus +Dubai +East_Turkestan +RepublicOfGeorgia +HongKong +India +Indonesia +Iran +Iraq +japan +Jerusalem +Jordan +Karakalpakstan +Kashmir +Kazakhstan +Kurdistan +Kuwait +Kyrgyzstan +Laos +Lebanon +Macao +Malaysia +Maldives +Mongolia +RepublicOfTheMountaineers +Myanmar +Nepal +KOREA +Najran +NorthernCyprus +Oman +Pakistan +MakePalestineGreatAgain +Philippines +Qatar +Rahmanland +Russia +Sarawak +SaudiArabia +SINGAPORE +SriLanka +Syria +Tamil_Eelam +Taiwan +Tajikistan +Tatarstan +THAILAND +Tibet +Turkey +Turkmenistan +UAE +Uzbekistan +Vietnam +Yemen

+Europe

+Albania +Andalusia +Andorra  +Armenia   +Austria   +Azerbaijan   +Belarus   +Belgium   +Bosnia   +Bulgaria     +Catalonia +Croatia   +Cyprus   +Czech +Denmark  +Donetsk +England +Estonia  +Finland +Flanders +France   +RepublicOfGeorgia   +Germany  +Greece  +Hungary   +Iceland  +Ireland  +IsleOfMan +Italy  +Kazakhstan  +Kosovo    +Latvia  +Liechtenstein  +Lithuania +Luhansk  +Luxembourg    +Malta   +Moldova  +Monaco  +Montenegro  +Netherlands +NorthernCyprus  +Macedonia   +Norway  +Poland  +Portugal +RepublicOfTheMountaineers +Romania   +Russia    +SanMarino   +Scotland +Sealand +Serbia +Sicily  +Slovakia  +Slovenia  +Spain   +Sweden  +Switzerland  +Tatarstan   +Turkey    +Ukraine  +UnitedKingdom +Vatican +Wales

If somebody can make the lists for the other continents and paste it below, I'll edit it in; yes I'm aware some countries identify as being part of more than one continent. And before you complain about psuedo-states...check out +SecedeToSucceed! :)
body_html:
+AMERICAS

+Greenland +Canada +Mexico +USA +Cascadia +Texas +Florida +CALIFORNIA +Guatemala +Honduras +ElSalvador +Nicaragua +Panama +Costa_Rica +Colombia +Brazil +Uruguay +Paraguay +Bolivia +Argentina +Chile +Ecuador +Guyana +Suriname +Venezuela +Peru

+Asia or +Asian

+Aceh +Afghanistan +armenia +Asir +Azerbaijan +Bahrain +Balochistan +Bangladesh +Bangsamoro +Bhutan +Brunei +CAMBODIA +CHINA +Cyprus +Dubai +East_Turkestan +RepublicOfGeorgia +HongKong +India +Indonesia +Iran +Iraq +japan +Jerusalem +Jordan +Karakalpakstan +Kashmir +Kazakhstan +Kurdistan +Kuwait +Kyrgyzstan +Laos +Lebanon +Macao +Malaysia +Maldives +Mongolia +RepublicOfTheMountaineers +Myanmar +Nepal +KOREA +Najran +NorthernCyprus +Oman +Pakistan +MakePalestineGreatAgain +Philippines +Qatar +Rahmanland +Russia +Sarawak +SaudiArabia +SINGAPORE +SriLanka +Syria +Tamil_Eelam +Taiwan +Tajikistan +Tatarstan +THAILAND +Tibet +Turkey +Turkmenistan +UAE +Uzbekistan +Vietnam +Yemen

+Europe

+Albania +Andalusia +Andorra +armenia +Austria +Azerbaijan +BELARUS +Belgium +Bosnia +BULGARIA +Catalonia +Croatia +Cyprus +Czech +Denmark +Donetsk +England +Estonia +Finland +Flanders +France +RepublicOfGeorgia +Germany +Greece +HUNGARY +ICELAND +Ireland +IsleOfMan +Italy +Kazakhstan +Kosovo +LATVIA +Liechtenstein +Lithuania +Luhansk +Luxembourg +Malta +Moldova +Monaco +Montenegro +Netherlands +NorthernCyprus +Macedonia +NORWAY +Poland +Portugal +RepublicOfTheMountaineers +Romania +Russia +SanMarino +Scotland +Sealand +Serbia +Sicily +Slovakia +Slovenia +Spain +Sweden +Switzerland +Tatarstan +Turkey +Ukraine +unitedkingdom +Vatican +Wales

If somebody can make the lists for the other continents and paste it below, I'll edit it in; yes I'm aware some countries identify as being part of more than one continent. And before you complain about psuedo-states...check out +SecedeToSucceed! :)
title: List of guilds for each nation

author.bio:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!
author.bio_html:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!

body: Make sure that they're mostly non-political. +SecedeToSucceed is a very political guild.
body_html: Make sure that they're mostly non-political. +SecedeToSucceed is a very political guild.

guild.description:
A guild that lists non political guilds as a directory for new and old ruqqies to find interesting stuff!

TBTop may have left this site and called it "a failed experiment on a failed site" but we do not believe that. Apolitical guilds and guilds of substance are the key to developing ruqqus beyond what it is, beyond the grip of the American political cycle and being close to the edge of what many call "right-wing extremism". We are the key, we are +guildsofsubstance.

Guild transparency:

Posts kicked: 1

Users exiled: 10 total, 8 by TBTop

body: True, it was only linked because I was including things like +Greenland or +Kashmir on the list and I didn't want people whining "That's not a country" or deleting it. *shrugs* I'm not going to go check out how much of +Iran is political or not...if it's too political, hopefully highlighting that it exists will encourage people to go discuss Iranian cinema, music or holidays or whatever as well. They all SHOULD be well-rounded, whether they're currently moderated or not.
body_html: True, it was only linked because I was including things like +Greenland or +Kashmir on the list and I didn't want people whining "That's not a country" or deleting it. shrugs I'm not going to go check out how much of +Iran is political or not...if it's too political, hopefully highlighting that it exists will encourage people to go discuss Iranian cinema, music or holidays or whatever as well. They all SHOULD be well-rounded, whether they're currently moderated or not.

+Albania +Andalusia +Andorra  +Armenia   +Austria   +Azerbaijan   +Belarus   +Belgium   +Bosnia   +Bulgaria     +Catalonia +Croatia   +Cyprus   +Czech +Denmark  +Donetsk +England +Estonia  +Finland +Flanders +France   +RepublicOfGeorgia   +Germany  +Greece  +Hungary   +Iceland  +Ireland  +IsleOfMan +Italy  +Kazakhstan  +Kosovo    +Latvia  +Liechtenstein  +Lithuania +Luhansk  +Luxembourg    +Malta   +Moldova  +Monaco  +Montenegro  +Netherlands +NorthernCyprus  +Macedonia   +Norway  +Poland  +Portugal +RepublicOfTheMountaineers +Romania   +Russia    +SanMarino   +Scotland +Sealand +Serbia +Sicily  +Slovakia  +Slovenia  +Spain   +Sweden  +Switzerland  +Tatarstan   +Turkey    +Ukraine  +UnitedKingdom +Vatican +Wales

parent.body: True, it was only linked because I was including things like +Greenland or +Kashmir on the list and I didn't want people whining "That's not a country" or deleting it. *shrugs* I'm not going to go check out how much of +Iran is political or not...if it's too political, hopefully highlighting that it exists will encourage people to go discuss Iranian cinema, music or holidays or whatever as well. They all SHOULD be well-rounded, whether they're currently moderated or not.

+Albania +Andalusia +Andorra  +Armenia   +Austria   +Azerbaijan   +Belarus   +Belgium   +Bosnia   +Bulgaria     +Catalonia +Croatia   +Cyprus   +Czech +Denmark  +Donetsk +England +Estonia  +Finland +Flanders +France   +RepublicOfGeorgia   +Germany  +Greece  +Hungary   +Iceland  +Ireland  +IsleOfMan +Italy  +Kazakhstan  +Kosovo    +Latvia  +Liechtenstein  +Lithuania +Luhansk  +Luxembourg    +Malta   +Moldova  +Monaco  +Montenegro  +Netherlands +NorthernCyprus  +Macedonia   +Norway  +Poland  +Portugal +RepublicOfTheMountaineers +Romania   +Russia    +SanMarino   +Scotland +Sealand +Serbia +Sicily  +Slovakia  +Slovenia  +Spain   +Sweden  +Switzerland  +Tatarstan   +Turkey    +Ukraine  +UnitedKingdom +Vatican +Wales

guild.description:
A guild that lists non political guilds as a directory for new and old ruqqies to find interesting stuff!

TBTop may have left this site and called it "a failed experiment on a failed site" but we do not believe that. Apolitical guilds and guilds of substance are the key to developing ruqqus beyond what it is, beyond the grip of the American political cycle and being close to the edge of what many call "right-wing extremism". We are the key, we are +guildsofsubstance.
